title: The Claiming of Rebellious Ryssa
description: This is an extremely explicit sex story of the claiming of Ryssa, a superhuman rebel Chrysalian trying to overthrow the evil male planetary invaders, the Dominants.After blowing up a Dominant base camp, Ryssa escapes into a cave where she encounters 2 mutant black panthers. She then returns back to her secret rebel base to play with her shield-mate, the dominant Carissa and receive orders for a new rebel mission from her Commander. In order to enter into Central City, Ryssa must be closely inspected for contraband by an alpha male Guard to the voyeuristic pleasure of the nearby Dominants. Ryssa then encounters a fellow rebel, the dominant Eloa who enjoys herself with Ryssa as she dresses her up as a maid and sends her off to work for the ruthless alpha male Colonel Styx and his very forceful mutant pets. This is a work of adult fiction meant for those over the age of consent.
author: Bella Swann
